The Social Network is a critically acclaimed biopic that provides an intimate look into the life of Facebook's founder, Mark Zuckerberg.

2. A Beautiful Mind (2001) - Based on the real-life story of John Nash, who was diagnosed with schizophrenia and later won the Nobel Prize in Economics for his groundbreaking work in game theory, this biopic stars Russell Crowe as John Nash, and Jennifer Connelly, Paul Rudd, and Cuba Gooding Jr. co-star.

A Beautiful Mind (2001) is a critically acclaimed biopic that provides an intimate look into the life of John Nash, who was diagnosed with schizophrenia and later won the Nobel Prize in Economics for his groundbreaking work in game theory.
